settings.gg8Kdy26WGc_childItem_0: Best quality breathable mesh fabric for optimal airflow, baby comfort
settings.gg8Kdy26WGc_childItem_1: Adjustable padded straps, waist belt relieve shoulder and back strain
settings.gg8Kdy26WGc_childItem_2: Integrated ergonomic hip seat Distributes weight for comfort
settings.ggS_ij0hi_Q_text:
1) 100% Cotton Fabric: Soft, breathable, and comfortable with excellent air circulation to keep baby cool.

2) Proper Support: Ergonomic design supports baby’s head, neck, spine, and hips for healthy development.

3) Multiple Carrying Positions: Inward-facing, horizontal feeding, or upright—choose what’s best for your baby.

4) Stylish & Comfortable: Sleek design with padded straps and breathable material for parent comfort.

5) For 4+ Months: Designed to safely support babies 4 months and older, offering a secure and snug fit.

settings.gg7ClOb5kRL_text: Absolutely. It meets international safety standards, featuring reinforced stitching, heavy-duty buckles, and lumbar support to ensure secure, ergonomic wear.
settings.gg9zDObAeER_text: Use the padded shoulder straps and wide waist belt, both with sliding buckles, to customize height, torso length, and snugness for any body shape.
settings.ggFzTXz4XO-_childItem_0: What age and weight range is the carrier suitable for?
settings.ggFzTXz4XO-_childItem_1: How do I clean the baby carrier?
settings.ggFzTXz4XO-_childItem_2: Can I breastfeed while wearing the carrier?
settings.ggFzTXz4XO-_childItem_3: How do I adjust the fit for different caregivers?
settings.ggU3EiMq6Ve_text: Yes—its ergonomic design and adjustable straps allow discreet, comfortable breastfeeding in the front-carry position.
settings.ggYCGR0pzkO_text: Simply machine-wash cold on a gentle cycle and line-dry. Avoid bleach or harsh detergents to preserve fabric integrity and colors.
settings.ggmSaJ2e9ay_text: The Cuddle Times carrier supports newborns up to toddlers (0–36 months), with a weight range of 3.5 kg (7.7 lb) to 15 kg (33 lb).
